Plot: Pulled to the far side of the galaxy, where the Federation is 75 years away at maximum warp speed, a Starfleet ship must cooperate with Maquis rebels to find a way home.
Title: Star Trek: Voyager
Writer: Rick Berman, Michael Piller, Jeri Taylor
Actors: Kate Mulgrew, Robert Beltran, Roxann Dawson, Robert Duncan McNeill
Awards: Won 7 Primetime Emmys. Another 25 wins & 84 nominations.
